cited_protocols.title: GENERATING THE POOLED SINGLE GUIDE RNA LIBRARIES

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f2c5q","text":"We have developed a protocol for lentiviral titration of human pluripotent stem cells (hPSCs), including induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) or human embryonic stem cells (hESCs). Concentrated lentiviral supernatants are added at various dilutions to adherent hPSCs in 48-well plates. Subsequent centrifugation, known as spinfection, ensures high efficiency in transduction. Transduction efficiency is quantified by determining the percentage of cells expressing Blue Fluorescent Protein (BFP) using Fluorescence Activated Cell Sorting (FACS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.section: Day 0: Coating wells with VTN-N and seeding hPSCs
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"44ket","text":"Coat 100 ul per well in a 48-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0: Coating wells with VTN-N and seeding hPSCs
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c847p","text":"Incubate the plate at room temperature for an hour and the plate is ready to be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0: Coating wells with VTN-N and seeding hPSCs
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0iee","text":"Seed 3x104 cells/cm2 in a 48 well plate with E8 flex media and RevitaCell after dissociating the cells with accutase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0: Coating wells with VTN-N and seeding hPSCs
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8ge4","text":"Incubate the cells overnight at 37ºC with 5% CO2 and 20.9% O2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1: Titration of hPSCs with Lentiviral CRISPRi library supernatant
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4m7mp","text":"Prepare 15 ml tubes with E8 flex media and concentrated lentiviral supernatants in serial dilutions in the 48 well plate in the following manner. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcpkm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8loea","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a90so","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t553","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35i62","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6hl76","text":"Make sure to mix well by gentle pipetting. Change tips after making up each dilution. Titration was done in triplicates.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"690343DD92CC45B28CA4DCC7913F5AD9"}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_10":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","0_4":"","0_5":"","0_6":"","0_7":"","0_8":"","0_9":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_10":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","1_4":"","1_5":"","1_6":"","1_7":"","1_8":"","1_9":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_10":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","2_4":"","2_5":"","2_6":"","2_7":"","2_8":"","2_9":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center steps.section: Day 1: Titration of hPSCs with Lentiviral CRISPRi library supernatant
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"64sod","text":"Aspirate the spent media with RevitaCell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1: Titration of hPSCs with Lentiviral CRISPRi library supernatant
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aim9r","text":"Add 200 ul /well for each viral dilution with the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1: Titration of hPSCs with Lentiviral CRISPRi library supernatant
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"u6in","text":"Incubate the cells at 37ºC with 5% CO2 and 20.9% O2 for 16-18 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqbum","text":"Aspirate the viral supernatant media gently and immediately add maturation media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"oo4c","text":"Return the plate back to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ajq","text":"Aspirate the spent media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cld0","text":"Wash the cells 10 times with DPBS to remove the viral particles from the lentivirus transduced hPSCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fka1a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6c8hd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1ebba","text":"Be very gentle while doing the washes as the cells tend to lift off during the wash step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"2953B0B190B0499C81B789FE61DD66F8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59rig","text":"Add 100 ul accutase and incubate the cells for 10 mins in the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a7gne","text":"Note: Ideally the hPSCs should dissociate as single cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cafqs","text":"Neutralize the accutase with E8 flex media and collect the cells into 1.5ml eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1g92k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj3r4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"269a6","text":"Use a P1000 tip to pipette the cells up and down to break them into single cell suspension.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0670A08A39954E2C8286912EE575FCA6"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3cf40","text":"Centrifuge the cells at 300 g for 4 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"u2s9","text":"Aspirate the spent media gently without disturbing the pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6dmin","text":"Resuspend the cells in 300 ul of FACs buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ciblo","text":"Transfer the cells with the FACs buffer into FACs tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9crk3","text":"Analyze the cells through flow cytometry to determine BFP positive cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abat9","text":"The Multiplicity of Infection (MOI) for CRISPRi screen was quantified as the 0.1-0.1 or 10-30% of BFP-positive cells to ensure one gRNA enters one cell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8itd","text":"Method 1: Calculating using dilution Factor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8svnn","text":"T= (NxFxD)/Vt

Where
T= Titer, (TU/mL)
N= Number of cells transduced
F= Fraction of cells with fluorescence
D= Dilution Factor
Vt= Transduction volume in mL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jktt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3lof","text":"Method 2: Calculating using volume of virus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s3ol","text":"T= NxFxVv

Where
T= Titer, (TU/mL)
N= Number of cells transduced
F= Fraction of cells with fluorescence
Vv= Virus volume","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5slgj","text":"Detailed calculation for lentiviral titration for the virus can be found in the following link: https://www.addgene.org/protocols/fluorescence-titering-assay/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":96,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":62}],"data":{}},{"key":"5jaui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F61DF2E2D69C11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.addgene.org/protocols/fluorescence-titering-assay"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gilv","text":"For Perturb seq, to restrict the viral integration in such a way that one virus infects one cell, we keep the MOI between 0.1-0.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5hl0","text":"Calculating the virus volume, for MOI (0.1-0.3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69go6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2a8h","text":"MOI=(T x Vv)/N","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blrca","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ea1j","text":"Where
T= Titer, (TU/mL)
N= Number of cells transduced
Vv= Virus volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6kk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1i2no","text":"Detailed protocol for calculating MOI can be found in the following link:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60ib2","text":"https://info.abmgood.com/multiplicity-of-infection-moi","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":54}],"data":{}},{"key":"b8paa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"885FB8B0D69D11EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://info.abmgood.com/multiplicity-of-infection-moi"}}}}
